snippet: A scholar at the Muscarelle Museum at the College of William and Mary has identified a canvas as being by El Greco.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Muscarelle Museum of Art will display a painting owned by Camilla Blaffer, which is now thought to have been painted by El Greco; Drawing Center will have more space for exhibitions after its $9.6 million renovation is complete; Michele Maccarone will expand her West Village gallery.
lead_paragraph: A scholar at the Muscarelle Museum at the College of William and Mary has identified a canvas as being by El Greco.

headline.seo: Muscarelle Museum Scholar Identifies an El Greco Work
headline.main: A Portrait’s Long Fingers Suggest El Greco
headline.print_headline: A Portrait’s Long Fingers Suggest El Greco
